sentence: Looking at units outstanding versus one week prior within the universe of ETFs covered at ETF Channel, the biggest outflow was seen in the Consumer Staples Select Sector SPDR Fund ( XLP ), where 11,600,000 units were destroyed, or a 7.4% decrease week over week.
Among the largest underlying components of XLP, in morning trading today Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) is up about 0.4%, and Coca-Cola Company ( KO ) is up by about 0.8%.

And on a percentage change basis, the ETF with the biggest outflow was the Gaming ETF ( BJK ), which lost 400,000 of its units, representing a 34.8% decline in outstanding units compared to the week prior.
Among the largest underlying components of BJK, in morning trading today Las Vegas Sands Corp ( LVS ) is down about 0.5%, and Mgm Resorts International (MGM) is lower by about 0.8%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
